100.title: Axe lessons
100.description:
You asked Jack for some advice with your axe handling.
He simply told you to not use the blund side, but the sharp one. You dummy...

This doubles your wood production!

200.title: Jack the Lumberjack
200.description:
A big, bearded man walks out of the forest. He introcues himself as Jack and offers to help you with your wood production
"For a moment I was really scared"
- You

Give Jack supplies for his house and he'll settle down.

201.title: Actual axe
201.description:
Now your lumberjack doesn't need to cut down trees with his hands anymore...
"Finally... thanks man"
- Jack the Lumber Jack

This doubles the lumberjack's production!

300.title: Get better at stone cutting...
300.description:
If you hit the cracks more stone breaks of! Who would have thought?

This doubles your stone production!

400.title: Fred the stonecutter
400.description:
One of Jack's helpers, Fred, seems to be more into rocks than trees. After Jack caught him hugging a large stone, he got fired... Couldn't you use a stonecutter?

Build a house for Fred and he'll produce stone for you.

401.title: The high note
401.description:
Fred loves to sing while cutting stone. He just perfected the high notes. They make the rocks crack!

This doubles the stonecutter's production!
